definition: The Book of One Thousand and One Nights

sentences.english: "The Arabian Nights" is a very interesting story-book.
sentences.chinese: “一千零一夜”“是一本极度风趣的故事书。

sentences.english: Storytellers enshrined gay love tales in the Thousand and One Nights.
sentences.chinese: 《一千零一夜》中也有同性爱的故事流传下来。

sentences.english: Stated in F&SF as being retold from the Sir Richard Burton translation in "A Thousand Nights and a Night".
sentences.chinese: 等于是一千零一夜寓言的重述，原发的时候说明了的。

sentences.english: She always spoke 1001 nights, finally made the king back from the brink.
sentences.chinese: 她一直讲了一千零一夜，终于使国王回心转意。
